title: Restore 16:9 homepage carousel behavior and update Home page Buy Now text color

requirements.summary: Ensure the Home page product carousel is visible (when enabled slides exist), stays 16:9, auto-plays with horizontal transitions, supports left/right arrows, and redirects using admin-configured URLsâ€”without header/footer changes.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, a carousel renders above the product catalog when there is at least one enabled carousel slide configured in Admin.
Carousel maintains a 16:9 aspect ratio (e.g., Tailwind `aspect-video`) across responsive breakpoints.
Carousel auto-advances through enabled slides without user interaction.
Carousel provides left/right arrow controls to navigate slides manually.
Clicking a slide navigates to that slide's configured redirect URL from the admin carousel settings.
No changes are made to the site header or footer components/styling.

file_operations.description: Confirm the homepage carousel uses enabled admin-managed slides (sorted by order), keeps a 16:9 container (aspect-video), auto-plays, uses horizontal slide transitions, and provides left/right arrow navigation controls; ensure slide clicks navigate to the admin-configured redirect URL. Use the blob-storage ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() rendering pattern for slide images. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the HomeCarousel is wired above the product catalog on the Home page and that it renders only when enabled slides exist (via HomeCarousel returning null), without touching header/footer-related files. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Change only the Home page product-card 'Buy Now' button text color to dark bottle green for all viewers (admin/customer), without header/footer changes.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page product grid, the 'Buy Now' button text is dark bottle green (use the existing bottle-green dark token/class used elsewhere, e.g., `text-bottle-green-dark`, rather than white).
The updated 'Buy Now' text color is visible consistently regardless of whether the viewer is an admin or a customer (same Home page route).
Only the homepage 'Buy Now' button text color is changed; header and footer remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the Home page product grid 'Buy Now' button styling so its text uses the existing dark bottle-green token/class (e.g., text-bottle-green-dark) and is not forced to white by any homepage CTA overrides (e.g., remove customer-cta-btn from Buy Now only). Keep all other button behavior and header/footer untouched. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
